product.name: LEMOMO 100% Blackout Curtains 52 x 84 Inch/Dark Grey Curtains Set of 2 Panels Thermal Insulated Room Darkening Bedroom Curtains
product.description:
LEMOMO 100% Blackout Curtains
Create a stunning ambiance with these thermal insulated room darkening blackout curtain panels.
Made form premium heavy polyester, these light blocking curtains help you enjoy a night like sleep during the day and maximize privacy.
Available in a variety of vibrant stylish solid colors, these curtain panels are the perfect addition for your bedrooms to living rooms.
product.bullet_points:
• 100% Polyester
• Package Includes 2 dark grey blackout curtain panels, each measures 52 in wide x 84 in long with 8 silver grommets of 1.6 in diameter
• Made from premium durable 100% polyester fabric, soft, smooth and no chemical smell
• Completely blocks light and UV rays for energy savings, privacy and noise reduction
• Thermal insulation keeps room cool in summer and warm in winter for added comfort
• Machine washable, do not bleach, iron at low temperature
